name: Surgery Prep
summary: Help your friend, a narwhal, get ready for surgery. Accompany them from the pre-op to the operating room. Earn stars by completing activities. It’s like a game, but it helps pediatric patients understand what surgery will be like and feel better about it. As one pediatric patient stated, while playing Surgery Prep at a hospital, “I had fun getting ready for my surgery.” Now you can too because Surgery Prep is available to the public. This is the first release with updates to follow. We welcome...
